summary: In a world ravaged by war, mankind's fate rests on the reluctant shoulders of one man. Exodus, a grim and unsmiling mercenary must lead the survivors to the enchanted land.
cast: Ramon 'Bong' Revilla Jr.|Benjie Paras|Aubrey Miles|Iya Villania|BJ Forbes|Paolo Bediones|Mark Gil|Jay-R|Long Mejia|Ramon Revilla|Phoemela Baranda|Jorge Estregan|Glen Almonte|Boy Roque|Eva Cadelina|King Gutierrez|Yeyey Yatco|Russel Molina|James Montelibano|D.R. Tolentino|Ramboy Revilla|Jolo Revilla|Minco Fabregas|Bryan Revilla|Ram Revilla|Bobbie Zialcita|Joonee Gamboa|Gene Palomo|Erik Matti|Cathy Bautista
keywords: cellphone|place name in title|dwarf|comatose|life support machine
title: Exodus: Tales from the Enchanted Kingdom
